data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Nayagarh.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nayagarh, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Nayagarh.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Nayagarh, Odisha, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Nayagarh, Odisha, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Kodalo people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, teach the young people in the county of Nayagarh to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 10,591 believers in Nayagarh to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 952,209 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the county of Nayagarh, Odisha, India has a population of 962,800.

We estimate Nayagarh has 10,591 people who might know Jesus, 11,682 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 940,527 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 940,527, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.
